example.parse: (IP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (PP-PRD (P 像) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 叛逆)))) (NP (NN 青少年))))))) (PU ，) (NP-TMP (QP (CD 许多)) (NP (NN 时候))) (PU ，) (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (NN 年龄)) (VP (VV 过) (AS 了))) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 雨过天青) (AS 了))))
